entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023
